India: Murder of Razia Sultan by Turkish nobles.(Chalisa)
Malta: Stationing of a Norman and Sicilian (Swabian) Garrison on Malta in 1240
Philippine: Tuan Masha'ika, an Arab, travels and introduces Islam to Sulu.
Russia: Battle of the Neva: The Novgorodian army defeated a Swedish invasion force at the confluence of the Izhora and Neva Rivers.
Spain: Ferdinand the Saint conquered Écija and Lucena, Córdoba.
Sweden: The Battle of the Neva takes place.
